Guardian:ModeShifter.NAME: Mode Shifter
Guardian:ModeShifter.FLAVOR: Protection where you need it most.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you lose 10 HP, gain 10 Block and Defensive Mode for 2 turns. NL Each activation increases the amount of HP required to activate again.

Guardian:ModeShifterPlus.NAME: Guardian Gear
DESCRIPTIONS: Begin each combat in Defensive Mode and extend its duration to 3 turns.

Guardian:DefensiveModeMoreBlock.NAME: Bronze Armor Plate
Guardian:DefensiveModeMoreBlock.FLAVOR: One can never have enough armor.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you use a card while in Defensive Mode, gain 1 more Block.

Guardian:GemCopier.NAME: Gem Tumbler
Guardian:GemCopier.FLAVOR: Only the most pristine will do.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a Gem card, play a copy of it.

Guardian:PocketSentry.NAME: Pocket Sentry
Guardian:PocketSentry.FLAVOR: Sentry Mode active. Target acquired. No hard feelings.
DESCRIPTIONS: Begin each combat with a Sentry Wave.

Guardian:SackOfGems.NAME: Sack of Gems
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 Gems to your deck.

Guardian:StasisCodex.NAME: Construct's Codex
Guardian:StasisCodex.FLAVOR: Designs and diagrams of the Spire's earliest prototypes.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with no cards in Stasis, choose 1 of 3 cards to place into Stasis.

Guardian:StasisSlotReductionRelic.NAME: Evacuation Plans
Guardian:StasisSlotReductionRelic.FLAVOR: Instructions for escaping the Spire.  Best not to let them fall into the wrong hands.
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, lose 2 Stasis slots. NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn.

Guardian:StasisUpgradeRelic.NAME: Cryo Chamber
Guardian:StasisUpgradeRelic.FLAVOR: Things always seem better coming out than they did going in.
DESCRIPTIONS: When a card enters Stasis, Upgrade it.

Guardian:BottledStasis.NAME: Bottled Black Hole
Guardian:BottledStasis.FLAVOR: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a #Card. Start each combat with this card in Stasis.
